input.sentences: the new ride is called the viper .
it has a lot of sharp turns .
the first group that went screamed a lot .
i was watching from the tower in the center of the park .
output.sentences: There is a fantastic ride called Viper in this park.
The ride is very fast with a lot of sharp turns.
People often scream a lot while on this rollercoaster.
There is a great tower near the ride so you can watch your loved ones if you are to afraid of the Viper to ride it.
However, most people simply love the ride.
